channel.title: GTA IV Question
channel.description: I turned on my ps3, went into gta, and found myself at my eastern apartment on the middle island (because of quick save). Anyways, I go outside and see tons of cars lined up. i go to the front and see a car in near perfect condition (the hood had a little bit of smoke coming out of it and was smashed in the middle) with [b]no bullet holes or broken glass[/b] and two dead guys inside. How is this possible? Also, it caused people to say "That's horrible!" and walk by weirdly. It also made Nico do some odd things with his hands...

item.title: GTA IV Question
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Yeah, but if the door was opened, wouldn’t the passenger try to get out? And there was no blood… I later reloaded the save and the same thing happened with a different car/person.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA IV Question
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I turned on my ps3, went into gta, and found myself at my eastern apartment on the middle island (because of quick save). Anyways, I go outside and see tons of cars lined up. i go to the front and see a car in near perfect condition (the hood had a little bit of smoke coming out of it and was smashed in the middle) with no bullet holes or broken glass and two dead guys inside. How is this possible? Also, it caused people to say “That’s horrible!” and walk by weirdly. It also made Nico do some odd things with his hands…

Read full topic
